channel.title: Voule Auto Restarter Question
channel.description:
When ever I try to run the auto restarter, a bo comes up saying "the application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135). Click OK to terminate application."
I have the .bat file and the program in my server files folder. What should I do to fix that up?
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: Voule Auto Restarter Question
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

This happens to me all the time with my winods files and for server restatrers you dont click them they automatically restart your server when there in your server folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Voule Auto Restarter Question
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

Get the latest version of .Net framwork, it’s released from microsoft.
It should work… Or you just need to extract the program.

Read full topic
